metadata.title: Friday, 23rd June, 2023
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) why the tarring of township roads in Chadiza District has stalled;
(c) what the cost of the project is;
(d) how much money had been paid to the contractor, as of June, 2022; and
(e) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.
(a) why the construction of the youth resettlement scheme in Mufumbwe Parliamentary Constituency has stalled;
(c) what the size of the scheme is;
(d) what facilities will be provided at the scheme;
(e) how many youths are targeted to occupy the scheme; and
(f) what the social and economic benefits of the scheme are.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines and Minerals Development
parts: (a) what the progress on the resolution of the conflict between the community and the investor at Kasenseli Gold Mine in Mwinilunga District is; and

(b) when the Mine will be re-opened for operations. NOTICE OF MOTION Mr. Mubika Adopt Report of the Committee on Transport, Works and Supply: That this House do adopt the Report of the Committee on Transport, Works and Supply on the Operations and Management of Zambia Airways - Challenges and Opportunities, for the Second Session of the Thirteenth National Assembly, laid on the Table of the House on Friday, 16th June, 2023. ____________________________
